version_description:
The BEYBLADE BURST app has ADDED a new multiplayer features and tournament modes. Compete head to head with your friends in battles using your local Wi-Fi. Test your BEYBLADE BURST top configurations by competing in tournament mode.
UPDATE : Local Multiplayer Feature: Local Wi-Fi, two-player battles.
UPDATE : Tournament Mode: Battle other tops for virtual in game Beycoins and XP.
UPDATE : Avatar Tracks: Train, Battle, Level up, and strive to become a BEYBLADE BURST master!

The BEYBLADE BURST app has ADDED a new multiplayer features and tournament modes. Compete head to head with your friends in battles using your local Wi-Fi. Test your BEYBLADE BURST top configurations by competing in tournament mode.
UPDATE : Local Multiplayer Feature: Local Wi-Fi, two-player battles.
UPDATE : Tournament Mode: Battle other tops for virtual in game Beycoins and XP.
UPDATE : Avatar Tracks: Train, Battle, Level up, and strive to become a BEYBLADE BURST master!

Updated Content
Light up your battles with RIP FIRE BEYBLADE BURST tops!
Light up your battles with RIP FIRE BEYBLADE BURST tops!

•BATTLE FRIENDS: Battle head-to-head against friends online and challenge others worldwide! 
•LEVEL UP TO BEYMASTER: Earn achievements to level up as a Blader —from Rookie to an ultimate BEYMASTER!
•LEADERBOARDS: See who is the top Blader among your friends in the friends leaderboardFRIEND LEADERBOARD
•PERSONALIZED PROFILES: Select a player icon and color from a gallery of options. Choose a continental team badge for battle!
•ENHANCED TOP SELECTION: Redesigned BEYBLADE BURST top selection screen allows you to easily see and filter your collection
•RESTORE PROGRESS: Retrieve lost progress through a restore code

•BATTLE FRIENDS: Battle head-to-head against friends online and challenge others worldwide! 
•LEVEL UP TO BEYMASTER: Earn achievements to level up as a Blader —from Rookie to an ultimate BEYMASTER!
•LEADERBOARDS: See who is the top Blader among your friends in the friends leaderboardFRIEND LEADERBOARD
•PERSONALIZED PROFILES: Select a player icon and color from a gallery of options. Choose a continental team badge for battle!
•ENHANCED TOP SELECTION: Redesigned BEYBLADE BURST top selection screen allows you to easily see and filter your collection
•RESTORE PROGRESS: Retrieve lost progress through a restore code

Minor bug fixes and improvements
wbba. WORLD EVENTS now live!

Minor bug fixes and improvements
wbba. WORLD EVENTS now live!

BATTLE LEAGUE
Improved navigation

TOY TOURNAMENT GUESTS
Quickly add non-Blader friends as a tournament guest

SCAN TO ADD FRIENDS
Add friends by their unique BLADER QR CODE

BATTLE TRACKS DASHBOARD!
Spirit Tracks is now BATTLE TRACKS. Collect your Beycoins and resend your scanned BEYBLADE BURST digital tops back to the BATTLE TRACKS!

GIFTING & FRIEND REWARDS
Gift BATTLE TRACK earned Beycoins to friends or add friends to earn FRIEND REWARDS to unlock digital content within the app

FIXES
RC Top Fix

Enjoy BATTLE LEAGUE now on your iPad Pro.
New BeyBlades Tops and BATTLE LEAGUE update

Check out the NEW Beymaster Invitational Area in the App.

12 Hand-picked Bladers from across the globe face-off to become the one ultimate BEYMASTER!
• Earn Beymaster Invitational Points to unlock the digital stadium.
• WATCH THE LATEST SHOWS!
• VOTE FOR YOUR FAVORITE CONTESTANT!
